</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[unitAddons]] className  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> className: [[String]] - class name of a unit/vehicle or object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[activateAddons]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Mar 31, 2014 - 23:38
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]<dd class="note">
1. From A3 1.14
<code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([player] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_unitAddon]]) // same as [[unitAddons]] ([[typeOf]] [[player]])</code>
2. To return the addon that a weapon belongs to, use [[BIS_fnc_weaponAddon]] instead. E.g.
<code>(([[primaryWeapon]] [[player]]) [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_weaponAddon]]); //return: "A3_Weapons_F_Rifles_Khaybar"</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
